freemarker.template.utility

类 NullWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • freemarker.template.utility.NullWriter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public final class NullWriter
extends Writer
    A Writer that simply drops what it gets.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.3.20
